data.title: About me
data.abstract: I am an associate professor at ISEN Ouest. My research interests include computer vision for underwater environments and are conducted at the Vision-AD team of the LabISEN. I teach computer science and pattern recognition at ISEN Brest engineering school.
data.keywords: Computer Vision, Underwater Vision, Pattern Recognition, Knowledge Distillation, Semantic Segmentation, Deep Learning / Artificial Intelligence, Image Enhancement.

content: Our paper Towards automation of warehouse management: Counting boxes on pallets via 3D reconstruction from a single image has been accepted to the SPRINGER Applied Intelligence journal
One conference paper accepted at OCEANS 2025 about anomaly detection via reverse distillation for ocean environments preservation

Associate Professor position with research on computer vision for underwater vision and teaching in computer science
Welcome to Simon Fournier who just started a research engineering fixed-term contract in our team!

Very proud that our PRME CESAR project was selected for funding by the ANR
